Class Ecommerce

java.lang.Object
Ecommerce
public class Ecommerce
extends java.lang.Object
The Ecommerce class is a container class. It contains:
  • People class
  • Customer class, that extends People class
  • Employee class, that extends Customer class
  • Wine class
  • Order class
  • register method
In the Ecommerce class there are three ArrayList:
  • customers arraylist, which contains all the customers and employees in the ecommerce
  • wines arraylist which contains all the wines currently listed in the ecommerce
  • ordersToBeProcessed arraylist which contains all the orders that have to be sent
This class acts as an abstraction of a wine ecommerce.
See Also:
Ecommerce.Wine, Ecommerce.Order, Ecommerce.Employee, Ecommerce.Customer

    Class People is a class that should never be instantiated.
